QuestData.Title: Stoneplow Thirsts
QuestData.Description: Excuse me... $n? Did I hear your name correctly?$b$bI've come from Stoneplow, in the west. They sent me to pick up some emergency beer rations, but the Stormstout Brewery is all boarded up!$b$bIt looks like your handsome friend there - no, not Mudmug, the other one - has a few casks with him. Could you spare a keg for a town in need?
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver a cask of The Emperor to Loon Mai at Stoneplow in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Finally! Emmi's come through.$b$bI hope all is well at the Stormstout Brewery. My men don't do well without beer.
